campaign.story:
28mm Miniatures for the French & Indian Wars
Stretch Goals
After hitting the funding goal we still have plenty more to get funded and get into molding.

FIW103 Canadian Militia Command 2 (Winter gear)
FIW320 British Grenadiers Command - Unlocked
Stretch Goal - FIW380 Provincials Command
Unlocked - Stretch Goal - Free Daniel Boone for all pledges $80 or more
Unlocked - FIW240 Compagnies Franches de la Marine Command (6 models)
Pledge Adjustments: Of course, if you would like more of any pack you can adjust your pledge total by $13 a pack.
Add other range packs: Regarding the original FIW release and the King Philips War range, you will be able to add those to your pledge at $13 per pack (normal retail $15 per pack.) You can also to add any of our AWI range to your pledge at $11 per pack.(normal retail $12 per pack.)  I will have the graphics set up to add here to make that more clear once I get them from Dave who helped me with the first KS and I add the additional packs that were released in the Backerkit survey.
These adjustments to your pledge all help with the Kickstarter Total and hitting stretch goals.
To Update Your Pledge:
New Add - Ons
FIW011 Natives with Bows (6)
FIW203 French Mounted Officer
FIW304 British Mounted Officer
FIW009 Native Civilians I (3)
FIW010 Native Civilians II (3)
FIW341-342 British Light Infantry

Core Packs - all 6 are unlocked with the Funding Goal met
The following packs are the core 6 packs. Hitting the funding goal  will allow us to start the master molds and production molds for these 6  packs.
Compagnies Franches de la Marine I (firing) (6)
Compagnies Franches de la Marine II (Advancing) (6)
British Grenadiers I (firing) (6)
British Grenadiers II (marching) (6)
American Provincials I (firing) (6)
American Provincials II (marching) (6)
FIW241 Compagnies Franches de la Marine I (firing) (6)
FIW242 Compagnies Franches de la Marine I (firing) (6)
FIW321 British Grenadiers I (firing) (6)
FIW322 British Grenadiers II (marching) (6)
FIW381 American Provincials I (firing) (6)
FIW382 American Provincials II (marching) (6)
Overview
Over the years, we've built up a number of fantastic ranges of  miniatures, many of them sculpted by the incomparable Paul Hicks. These  ranges cover King Philip's War, the American War of Independence,   Napoleonic Wars, the War of 1812, Western and many others.
In May 2020, our first This Very Ground French and Indian War  Kickstarter was launched and was wildly successful, funding 103  miniatures and the new rulebook.
With the This Very Ground 2 - French and Indian War Kickstarter, we have had Paul expand the range.
The French & Indian Wars featured a lot of skirmishing and   guerilla warfare and our initial offer definitely reflects that. Paul  has sculpted miniatures that you can use to add to your existing models  from our first This Very Ground FIW kickstarter, flesh out an existing  collection, or to get one started.
Our core packs, and the packs that we unlock via Stretch Goals, are shown here in the campaign section. There are many packs and resin items waiting to be unlocked. 
Add-Ons
Just increase your pledge if you would like any of these add-ons with your pledge. It all counts towards the funding and stretch goals.
This Very Ground: Victory or Death

Add Printed Copy for $20 or PDF copy for $15.  This Very Ground: Victory or Death was written by Keith Stine and has been published by Sinister  Laboratories. This new edition of an old favorite was funded during the  first TVG FIW kickstarter campaign and is available as a Softback or  PDF.

To take a look at images for all the available French and Indian War packs from the first TVG FIW Kickstarter, click here:
Brigade Games French and Indian War Range
To take a look at images for all the available King Philip's War packs, click here:
Brigade Games King Philips War range
To take a look at images for all the available AWI packs, click here:
Brigade Games American War of Independence range
To take a look at images for all the available 1812 packs for the British and Canadians, click here:
Brigade Games War of 1812 - British and Canadians range
To take a look at images for all the available 1812 packs for the U.S., click here:
Brigade Games War of 1812 - United States range
Size Comparison
Comparison of BrigadeGames.com miniatures to other 28mm ranges

L to R: Perry, Brigade  Games, Fife and Drum, BG, King's Mountain, BG,  Old Glory 2nd Ed., BG,  Wargames Foundry, BG, Front Rank, BG, Eureka

Shipping Costs
Your Pledge Total does not include Shipping costs. Shipping costs   will be collected in the pledge manager that will follow the conclusion   of the Kickstarter campaign.
Please note that the shipping costs depends on your location and the   weight of the final parcel – the more packs, the higher the cost.   BrigadeGames ships overseas parcels every day so we are well prepared  to  ship parcels anywhere. Typical charges for the USA will be $9-$16 ||   Canada, Mexico $17-$28  ($39 up to 3 pounds) || UK, France,   Germany, Belgium, Netherlands, Italy, Ireland, Luxembourg, Japan,   HK, Austria, Denmark, Spain, Portugal, Finland, Norway, Switz., Sweden,   Greece*, Russia*, Croatia, Lithuania, Poland, Gibraltar, Czech   Republic, Hungary, Belarus, Australia, NZ, Israel  $19-$29 ($46 up to 3   pounds.)
*Shipments to Greece and Russia will also require registered mail service which is an additional $20.
We also expect to be able to offer a "split shipment" option if  necessary, where you could decide to have the first wave of miniatures  shipped first (in May/June) and the second wave shipped later (in  June/July.)
About the Team
Lon Weiss is the owner of BrigadeGames.com and has been in business   since 2000, importing great wargaming products and creating our own  considerable ranges of miniatures. We are known world-wide as a producer   of very high quality historical and fantasy miniatures. BrigadeGames  is a one-man band (with convention assistance from the BG crew) but we  are pleased to work with many talented people in the  industry, like  Paul Hicks and Keith Stine.
The miniatures are sculpted by Paul Hicks, who renowned as a master   of his craft. Paul is BrigadeGames' primary sculptor and has sculpted a   majority of Lon's ranges including: French and Indian War, American  War of Independence, Napoleonics, War of 1812, King  Philip's War,  Western, Pacific War, Pirates, Musketeers, Gladiators,  Atomic Cafe,  China at War, etc.
Molding and casting is being done in the USA.
We have hosted 8 successfully funded Kickstarters - seven with miniatures (some with rulebooks as well), and one for a rulebook.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The first 14 packs (68 miniatures) have already been sculpted, are in the USA, and are ready to go through the master and production molding and casting processes. Miniatures for the stretch goals are either sculpted or being sculpted. The masters are ready for molding the resin item. The risks are minimal for BrigadeGames, we have been in business for 21 years and have over 3,000 miniatures that we have had sculpted, molded and cast in the historical and fantasy miniatures market under our own brand. We are using a contract molder and caster that we already have an established relationship and currently molds and casts 75% of our ranges. We do not anticipate any major issues or delays. Of course if the pandemic or other unforeseen event causes business closures at some point then the delivery schedule could be impacted.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Welcome Wargamers, Model Builders And Tabletop Gamers!
The goal of this Kickstarter is to make a fantastic book about the greatest hobby on this planet: Miniature Terrain Making
Philipp aka Tabletop Lenny is fascinated about making terrain for more than 25 years. He shares his projects on Instagram and YouTube. And now the time has come to do the next step. Together with his wife Marina, they decided to create Miniature Terrain Making Vol. 1.
The book contains a wide range of easy & effective techniques to get your terrain ideas on the gaming table. As well as chapters about advanced modeling techniques to make highly realistic terrain and scenery. Of course the book also includes inspirational pictures and exclusive terrain projects.
By joining this Kickstarter you receive more than 20 pages with printable templates that boost your crafting to the next level.
Techniques & Materials
Model making materials like foam, different types of foliage, or balsa wood. This section explains how you can use specific tools and materials effectively to create stunning looking terrain for your collection.
The following example shows different ways how you can make walls of XPS-Foam.
Terrain Tutorials
A SiFi battlefield, dramatic rock formations, a grimdark forest, ancient pyramids, or deadly swamps: Of course the book offers a great variety of projects, including detailed process descriptions.
This terrain for example is mostly made of cardboard. The tutorial illustrates techniques to make scenery using materials you already have at home. You can even use the packaging of the book and get started.
Templates
To simplify the building process you get 20 pages with templates of items like walls, windows, paving, or doors. You can print them and craft complex shapes that make your models look cutting-edge. The templates can be used in various ways and can be combined with different building techniques like layering cardboard or engraving foam. (More templates will get unlocked by reaching more stretch goals)
Guest Articles
Our first guest in the book is Michael from the well-known YouTube channel Tabletop Workshop (TWS). He is also the author of the famous book `Tabletop Terrain From XPS Foam – Buildings´. Michael will share some of his most improved techniques and tips exclusively for you.
Inspiring Terrain Pictures
And of course, the book provides inspiring projects that have been crafted with patience and passion.
The goal is to keep this Kickstarter simple. The more backers participate, the more content you will receive. That means: More pages, more templates, and more extras!
All books will be delivered with tracking and priority.
Please note as well: Your pledge on Kickstarter covers your reward and shipping fee. The country-specific VAT and other taxes or import fees collected by the local authorities are not included!
We are planning to ship your copy of the book by December  2021. We will keep you updated!  Stay safe and healthy!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With her professional traits as an experienced graphic designer and artist Marina will create a unique book. 

Philipp is fascinated about making terrain models for more than 25 years now. He loves to create tiny landscapes and buildings. Apart from being a miniature terrain enthusiast he is a landscape architect and photographer.

Let the world know about this Kickstarter and get a great book about Miniature Terrain Making!

Thank you very much! Have fun and keep on making terrain!

updates.update_content:
Hope you are all well! We have been on the road for a few days and tried, under the current circumstances, to make something like a vacation. And it was good! Now we continue working on our book with new energies. We are really looking forward to it and have more than a thousand ideas.
Until the next update!  

Best regards,
Marina & Philipp

Due to the high demand you now have the opportunity to support the campaign as a late pledge. The pre-order runs via our store. 

Please note the following: 
Add only one additional book to the ``late pledge order''.

First of all, thank you so much for the incredible support over the last 30 days! 
It's been a fantastic journey and we still can't really believe that so many people on this planet believe in our idea. However, this is not the end of this journey, but at most a stopover, because the biggest part is still ahead of us. We look forward to creating a great book for you about Miniature Terrain Making. Now let's take a breath first and then dive into the work!

updates.update_userinfo: More stretch goals and more pages?
updates.update_content:
Now it's time for the final round! And of course we have added two more ambitious stretch goals. 
You now have the last chance to add 12 more pages to the book. Let's see what is happening! 
Thank you very much for your great support! You are world class!

campaign.story:
In Hellboy: The Dice Game, you take on the role of a B.P.R.D. recruit exploring a mysterious location. As a new recruit your abilities and resources are limited so you'll need your wits about you to try and survive. Push your luck to press deeper into the unknown or play it safe and live to fight another day. The choice is yours!
The game includes a deck of rooms that you must explore. Some will contain harmless frog swarms, whereas others will hide dangerous frog monsters or even more notorious foes from Hellboy's past! The differently coloured dice represent your limited resources and you must choose carefully when selecting which ones to roll. If you run out of dice or wounds, it's the end of your turn.
 The thrilling Dice Game isn’t the only way to back this Kickstarter because we’re also funding FOUR brand-new expansions for Hellboy: The Board Game. Designed by original developers, Needy Cat Games, each of these expansions builds on the tension-packed, co-operative experience of Hellboy: The Board Game but turns the danger up to 11, thanks to the all-new optional Ragnarok mode.

That’s right, saving the world just got a whole lot tougher as enemies become stronger and more difficult to defeat. Ragnarok mode can be used to offer an additional challenge to not only these new expansions, but the core game as well. It's perfect if you've breezed through the previous Case Files and want an even tougher experience!
Please note, you will need Hellboy: The Board Game in order to play these expansions.
You’ve played through the core game, Darkness Calls and The Wild Hunt. Now it’s time to bring the saga to a close with The Storm and The Fury. Armed with a certain magical sword (no spoilers here, just in case), Hellboy must face his toughest foe yet: Nimue in her dragon form. This is the biggest miniature we’ve made for Hellboy: The Board Game and it’s not going to be easy to take her down.
3D renders of miniatures.
The Storm and the Fury includes new miniatures, an epic Case File, new Deck of Doom cards, new Encounter Cards and a new playable version of Hellboy.
Test miniatures painted by Studio Giraldez. Miniatures supplied unpainted.


HELLBOY AND THE B.P.R.D.
But that’s not all for Hellboy: The Board Game fans because with the storyline complete, it’s time to move onto a whole new chapter inspired by the B.P.R.D. graphic novels. These three new expansions focus on a different element to make your games of Hellboy more unpredictable and action-packed than ever before.
With Hellboy gone, the B.P.R.D. faces a range of horrifying new minions as the world descends into chaos. The Hell on Earth expansion introduces new minions to add to your missions. From swarming Crickets, to demons and Ogdru-Hem mutants, you’re going to wish you were only facing the Frog Monsters from the core game. This expansion includes 15 minion miniatures, the Nesting Site Case File and Encounter cards, plus all the minions can be mixed into existing missions using the previously released B.P.R.D. Archives expansion.
If only it were just the minions you needed to deal with... but they're the least of your concerns. In Pandemonium some all-new bosses are here to try and end the world. This expansion includes The Flood Case File, Enemy cards, Unexpected Threat Hammerhead card, Encounter cards and Boss Behaviour Cards.
With all that, you’re going to need some new heroes and the B.P.R.D. is here to save the day. End of Days includes new playable agents – Ted Howards, Sledgehammer, Evolved Abe Sapien and Flaming Liz Sherman – plus the Eviction Notices Case File, character-specific Deck of Doom cards and Requisition Cards. Use these new agents to tackle the new expansions or return to your favourite missions from the original game and play them again with a fresh cast of heroes.
Test miniatures painted by Studio Giraldez. Miniatures supplied unpainted.
Combined with the original Kickstarter or the core game, these new missions make Hellboy: The Board Game infinitely replayable. Please note, you will need Hellboy: The Board Game in order to play these expansions.


 Tabletop Gaming magazine plays a prototype version of Hellboy: The Dice Game.
James from Needy Cat Games and B.P.R.D. consultant Edwin, talk about what you can expect from the new expansions! Rob from Mantic's audio does get better... we promise, plus all the important stuff comes from James and Edwin anyway.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are a number of risks with any Kickstarter project, especially getting accurate timings for such complex products with so many components. With this project, the expansions are all written and approved by Dark Horse, the miniatures and game components are approved by Dark Horse. Meanwhile, the Dice Game is also approved by Dark Horse.

We predict that we will begin shipping in June 2022 - however, the exact timing is impossible to predict and there is always the potential for delay with products produced in China. We will of course keep our backers up to date as best we can once the project closes. COVID is still causing some issues with manufacturing and this could also impact the final shipping date.

To date, we’ve successfully fulfilled 17 Kickstarter campaigns: Kings of War, DreadBall, LOKA, Mars Attacks: The Miniatures Game, Deadzone, DreadBall Xtreme, Dungeon Saga, Kings of War 2nd Edition, Deadzone: Infestation, The Walking Dead: All Out War, DreadBall Second Edition, Star Saga: The Eiras Contract, Warpath, TerrainCrate, Kings of War: Vanguard, Hellboy: The Board Game and TerrainCrate 2. We currently have two outstanding Kickstarters, League of Infamy (mostly shipped) and Hellboy: The Roleplaying Game (digital rewards have been delivered, physical rewards are due to be shipped this year). 

REFUNDS
Upon request refunds may be given within 14 days of the campaign ending, including fees. Following that time, refunds may be given minus Kickstarter and payment fees. In order to request a refund you must contact support@manticgames.com

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
By backing this campaign you acknowledge that the components, artwork and game elements may change in the final edition. This means some elements may differ from those shown here following the Kickstarter campaign.

If you do not complete the pledge manager within the time specified when the pledge manager is sent, you agree that your contribution to the campaign was a donation and your pledge is fulfilled. Of course, we will use our discretion on a case by case basis. Completing the pledge manager is the ONLY way for us to confirm your shipping address and pledge details, as well as making sure we hit the production timelines.

By pledging on this Kickstarter you agree that you will pay for any shipping and any import or other duties required in your country. If you refuse to pay customs or duties and do not accept the package, it will be destroyed and you will not be eligible for a refund. You also accept that you are liable for providing us with the correct shipping details upon request and we are not responsible for items lost in transit if sending to an incorrectly provided address. We also cannot ship to PO boxes and you must provide an alternative shipping in this circumstance.

Although we are aiming to deliver the Hellboy: The Board Game expansions to Kickstarter backers before the game is available at retail, production and shipping delays can lead to delivery at the same time or following the retail release. If you do not agree to these terms, then please purchase the game once it's available at your friendly local gaming store in 2022.

campaign.story:
Campaign Finale Live Stream at 4:00PM CDT
 <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/lSIiFIK8ud4" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Claim Your Turf
Gangs of the Undercity is a cyberpunk/fantasy skirmish game set in the Undercity of Neo-Babylon. The city is bright, magical, and wonderful above; below, the only sources of stability, community, and aid are the Gangs. Unstable magic, outdated Cybertech, and garbage from the overcity become invaluable commodities underneath. The species dwelling there – dwarves, goblins, humans, orcs, yetin, and elves – fight among themselves and each other: alliances formed and broken as just another day’s work.
In Gangs of the Undercity, these gangs are represented by models you choose and paint. Your play area becomes a neighborhood in the Undercity, equal parts futuristic, wondrous, and crumbling from neglect. Abandoned buildings, noodle shops, power plants, feral beasts, and jury-rigged computer interfaces exist to be exploited or overcome. Defeat rivals using your wits, your gang, and a little luck.
Whether you take control of a pre-existing gang, shape it to your own style, or make your own gang from scratch, you’ll soon be discovering the secrets of the Undercity, all while claiming and reclaiming turf.
Your gang’s reputation, influence, and future depend on you!

The Gangs of the Undercity Two-Player Starter Set includes two of the most influential gangs in the Undercity: 
the rag-tag Flaming Skulls, an aggressive street gang of orcs, humans, dwarves and more;
the militaristic Valkyrs, an-all elf gang hitting the streets of Neo-Babylon’s Undercity to rebuild their lost power base.
The Valkyrs, led by Adelante and her enforcer, Mormeghul, are exiles from their elven homeland. Having fought for their country, they were dismissed and shunned because of their brutality. The Valkyr Company fled with their Sorcier General to the Undercity of Neo-Babylon, where they bide their time. They don’t care what or who they destroy, they have formed their own nobility, and when they are strong enough, they’ll retake their birthright. 
The Valkyrs gang includes:
Adelante (elf sorcerer)
Mormeghul (elf cyber-enforcer)
Mordo (elf sniper)
Sparrow (elf ganger)
Ansa (elf pistoleer)
Acid (elf ganger)
 ***
The Flaming Skulls, led by Vengeance and the gutterwitch Char, are what people think of when they picture out-of-control gangs running amok in the Undercity. They don’t stay in their own turf, they set fires, destroy property, and take anything that is easy. They stay on the offensive. Using fear and explosions to dominate and intimidate, the Flaming Skulls attract the misfits and losers that don’t fit in elsewhere. If they have a plan, they don’t show it, but woe to anyone who gets in their way.   
The Flaming Skulls gang includes:
Vengeance (orc yojin)
Char (human witch)
Spur (dwarf breacher)
Domino (human cyber-junkie)
Snapper (ogre gunner)
Singe (goblin sneak thief)
***
Additional Gangs
These Gang models are not in the 2 Player Starter Set, but have been unlocked and will be added to the Rulebook alongside the Valkyrs and Flaming Skulls.
*Note: there may not be art or minis unlocked to represent the entire gang, but whether by stretch goal unlock, or development down the road, we will fill out these gangs just like the Valkyrs and Flaming Skulls*
Lawjacks
 The Lawjacks are the faceless police that protect the Overcity’s economy, elites, and social status quo.  Their motto is providing "peace through obedience," but whatever that might have once meant to folk in the Undercity, it now only serves as a warning. The Undercity was abandoned by the rule of law long ago. But that isn’t to say there aren’t any Lawjacks in the Undercity. Along with Lawjack Golems - magically constructed juggernauts – Lawjacks from above often descend to the depths despite no official sanction. The only group able to come and go from the Undercity as they please, some realized the profitability in illicit activity without fear of prosecution. So whatever they might be in the Overcity, to the Undercity, the Lawjacks are just another violent gang.
The Lawjacks Gang includes:
Lawjack Captain
Lawjack Enforcer
Lawjack Soldier
Lawjack Rookie
Armored Golem
***
Shadow Caste
 The Shadow Caste does not discriminate based on blood or birth, but recruits from all species and walks of life. Despite their home in the Undercity, they are not so desperate as the other denizens. They actually prefer the undercity for its lawless nature and freedom from authority’s eye. Led by the mysterious Demon Kober, they’ve been around at least as long as Neo-Babylon has, but if you believe their propaganda; they are a much older order. Each member carries an heirloom blade, passed down from former Caste members, which is but one tool in their arsenal as they carry out their duties of theft and, if the Demon calls for it, assassination.
The Shadow Caste includes:
Demon Kober (male human)
Kartika (female elf)
Deaavh (female orc)
Vadok (male goblin)
Plaie (female dwarf)
Tuerer (human foot soldiers)
***
The Bulls of Heaven
 The Bulls of Heaven are a gang composed mostly of yetin and their traditional allies. They lean more toward the gang-as-family model, lending itself to strong bonds between the members and their community, where they care for all types, even the smaller folk, equally.
While not strongly hierarchical, each family has a leader, but the relationship is not coercive. Decisions outside of combat are often held collectively. Physical prowess is respected over gunslinging, thus the gang has a preference for heavy and blunt melee weapons. The Bulls seem to be the most spiritual of the gangs as well; even their name comes from the scriptures, where Gilgamesh killed the gods’ sacred servant – the Bull of Heaven.
Despite their fearsome appearance, they are one of the "less violent" gangs. Preferring to use threat of berserk yetin rampages over actual force, the Bulls never allow others to intimidate them or their people.
The Bulls of Heaven include:
Chirashree (yeti)
Chiye-Tanka (sasquatch)
Dorje (cybered yeti)
40/40 (almaslar)
Nu (rogue golem)
Raz (ogre)
Fragging Unicorns Games is Kickstarting this project to fund the launch costs of Gangs of the Undercity. Pre-production costs and development have already been covered, which will allow us to put our game into production immediately. We hope to make enough through the Kickstarter to recover these sunk costs, and to put down deposits on other amazing upcoming projects
Since the game is nearly 100% complete, we look forward to shipping to our backers as soon as possible; barring any major problems we are planning to deliver before December, 2020. We also promise to fulfill any and all pledges before any Gangs of the Undercity products are on sale – backers will get their stuff before anyone else!
The Two-Player Starter Set gives you everything you’ll need to get into Undercity gang wars with a friend as soon as possible.
MODELS
12 highly detailed gang miniatures, including 6 Valkyrs and 6 Flaming Skulls gangers. Bases for each included. Our models are cast from high quality metal (pewter) so we can get the best quality and value possible. 
RULES
A pocket-sized (5.5" x 8") rulebook, with complete rules for the playing the game, customizing existing gangs, and creating your own gang. Covers the two-player head-to-head game mode, the campaign play, and solo gameplay!

*All pledges at Rookie or above may purchase add-ons. Add-ons will be handled through Backerkit, our pledge manager after the main campaign has ended. All of these options will be there, and it will be like a fun, online shopping cart that you can fill with happy toys.*
MINIATURE ADD-ONS

Typical models will be $10, while larger models or kits that make more than one model or have lots of extra options might be more. All miniatures will be cast in metal (pewter), except the elementals which will be transparent resin. The following list of models is available to add-on:
Flaming Skulls:
Vengeance, Char, Snapper, Spur, Domino, Singe
Valkyrs:
Adelante, Mormeghul, Ansa, Sparrow, Acid, Mordo
Lawjacks:
Lawjack captain, Riot Lawjack, Hassling Lawjack, Female Lawjack, Golem kit*
Shadow Caste:
Demon Kober, Shifty Goblin*

Yetin Kit*, Golem Kit
Neverkin
UpR1z3r, Unbroken,

Companions
Anthoid, Wardog, Breachfly, Turret, Gryphon, Water Elemental, Air Elemental, Fire Elemental, Earth Elemental, Void Elemental, B'eagle Griff, Valravn Griff

Gang Boxes
As models become unlocked, the ability for us to bundle miniatures together as gangs increases. The gang boxes will be cheaper than buying individual models and give you what you need right away to start a gang that isn't in the box set or add to your collection at a more affordable price! Some models may appear in more than one box, as they are meant to be able to appear in more than one gang. As unlocks become available, the contents of the boxes may alter. Prices will be available soon, so check back shortly.
Available Gang Boxes:
 - Lawjacks Box: The lawjack box comes with 4 Lawjack models (one of each sculpt) and a Golem kit. 
 - Bulls of Heaven Box: The BoH box comes with 2 Yetin kits (to make a total of 4 models) and a Golem Kit.

 - Elementals box: The Elementals box contains:  1 Water Elemental, 1 Air Elemental, 1 Fire Elemental, 1 Earth Elemental, and 1 Void Elemental
TERRAIN
Death Ray Designs has brought Neo-Babylon’s Undercity to life with their Undercity terrain. Check out the options below to get these beautiful sets on your table!
FULL TABLE TERRAIN BUNDLE
HALF TABLE TERRAIN BUNDLE
CYBERLINKS
POCKET RULEBOOK
Want an extra pocket rulebook for a friend? Want an extra for yourself? Want to buy pocket sized rulebooks for everyone at your local FLGS? Here’s how!
GRIT TOKENS

DICE
Extra dice can be purchased for each gang as well. You can get an additional 12 Valkyr Dice or 12 Flaming Skulls Dice for $10.
MEASURING TAPE

Targets & Stretch Goals
Once we hit our initial funding goal, we have some fun stuff in mind! We’ve made a plan for Stretch Goals which include a variety of different types of boons for our supporters:
 Financial Stretch Goals, which unlock add-ons and new gameplay options,
 Social Media Based Goals, which unlock Fiction and Swag rewards,
 Backer Number Goals, which unlock add-ons and alternate poses/weapons.
Social Media Goals
 700 Followers on Facebook – if we reach this goal, all of our backers will get an PDF anthology of fiction stories for free. These will be set in the Universe of Gangs, and will feature stories by Russell Zimmerman, O.C. Presley, and more. https://www.facebook.com/FraggingUnicornsGames
   4,500 Twitter followers – if we reach this goal, we hire Russell Zimmerman to write a Novel for us! All backers will get free previews of this novel, but since Rusty likes to eat, everyone will have to buy this one.  https://twitter.com/FragginUnicorns
   600 on the Mailing List – if we reach this goal, we will produce a Gangs of the Undercity cookbook, and give it away free to all backers! https://1.shortstack.com/7j2SJ9 
Backer Number Goals 
Stretch Goals
For full transparency, we want you to know how we are using your support. Up to $12,000, all support will be used to fulfill pledges and get our backers the game. After Kickstarter takes 10%, Backerkit takes 3%, the remaining 87%  will go towards production.
$12,000 – GOAL! This covers the cost of producing the game, alongside Kickstarter’s 10% fee, Backerkit's 3%, and any unforeseen complications.
Once we hit our funding goal, our use of support changes to this model: 10% to Kickstarter, 3% to Backerkit, 52% production with any surplus going toward investment in future products), and 35% going towards paying off debts.
Once we hit $50,000 goal, further support will be used as follows: 10% to Kickstarter, 3% to Backerkit, 52% production (with any surplus going toward investment in future products), 25% towards paying our volunteers, and 10% investment in the future of Fragging Unicorns.
SHIPPING
We are working hard to keep shipping costs down. Shipping costs will be handled after the Kickstarter campaign wraps, but will reflect the prices shown below. If shipping costs increase in the meantime, and they may, Fragging Unicorns will pay those, not you. Do not include shipping in your pledge. Just plan ahead using the chart.
You are required to provide correct address information and ensure this address is deliverable by normal methods before your rewards are shipped. You must have your address correct and up to date when we announce shipping is beginning. You may change it at any time until then. 
Rewards returned to us as undeliverable will be shipped again postage prepaid by the Backer.
Buzz
Here's what pro painters are saying about our minis:
"The two minis I painted had awesome dynamic poses and design, they can really stand out on the playmat. Between Ansa's cool headed and battle ready pose and Char's pure rage and aggressive stance and expression it was a blast to put color to them and really see 'em come to life" - Nonsense Painting
"This mini's dynamic and aggressive pose was so expressive and a blast to paint. Can't wait to get my hands on more !" - Dev Paints
"These are really wonderful and enjoyable minis to paint. The sculpts are incredibly detailed and dynamic with a real sense of character. The casting quality is fantastic and I'm incredibly excited to paint more." - Agent Meeple
"Domino practically painted himself, with his ready for havoc attitude. He was a fantastic sculpt and honor to paint up." - Brushforhire
"I really enjoyed painting up Acid, the great detail made bringing him to life a joy; right down to his personalized knuckledusters. Fragging Unicorns have done an awesome job with these minis, they have a bunch of personality, are loads of fun to paint & are of a great quality. ^.^" - Electric Eve
"I really enjoyed getting to work on Adelante! The miniature is high quality with a lot of nice detail and character. She was a joy to paint - especially with some fun cyberpunk colors!" - Sullivan Mini Studio
Here's what the players are saying about the game:
"as a fast-paced and brutal skirmish game GotU blends sci-fi tech with magic seamlessly, it's strength lies in the Grit mechanic which forces you to become a gambler on your tactics and strategy constantly offering choices. Do you double down and risk it all or accept a small loss for greater gains later? It is the lifeblood of your Gang be careful you don't bleed out in the Undercity" - Gerry mcCabe, OnTableTop/Beasts of War
"I've had the opportunity to playtest this at multiple phases of development. It is SO much fun. Exactly what I want in a cyberpunk gang skirmish miniatures game!"
"Awesome game with a great setting and a lot of love put into it. Super excited for the Kickstarter!"
"Had a lot of fun playing in the public beta, excited to see this launch soon!"
"Played as part of the playtest and this has easily been the most fun I've had with a miniatures wargame. I love how accessible it is while still having strategic play options."
"Easy to explain rules, quick and dynamic gameplay"
"I really liked the variety of attacks in a given match, between spells and breaching. It makes the battles very dynamic."

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
PRODUCTION AND FULFILLMENT

Challenges and risks include longer than normal shipping times due to Covid-19 related slow downs. All of our manufacturing is US-based, so mismanagement and delays on production are minimal. New unlocked sculpts will take time to create and produce, so will take longer to ship than the base game.

Our the risks and challenges are as follows:
1) We don't make our goal, and are unable to produce the game.
2) Delays in meeting our estimated delivery dates, most likely due to Covid-related slow-downs. However, we have multiple suppliers for our components, at least one US-based company for each component, so mismanagement and delays on production are minimal. We won't sacrifice fulfillment or punctuality just to save a few bucks.
3) We may change a component, box, specific model or change/subtract or add a piece to a specific model. In these cases, the change will be always towards a higher quality, not the other way around. It could be that we just find a way to improve something, or perhaps a particular model needs to be shifted slightly to match the character, etc. 
4) New unlocked sculpts will take time to create and produce, so will take longer to ship than the base game.

REFUND POLICY

If it is within 14 days of the closing of this Kickstarter we will refund your entire pledge amount. After 14 days, but before close of pledge manager, we will refund your entire pledge minus the 10% Kickstarter, 3% Backerkit, and Processing Fees we incur. Once the pledge manager has closed, refund requests are subject to review and not all requests may be able to be honored.

YOUR BACKER RESPONSIBILITY IN THIS KICKSTARTER

If you do not finalize your pledge in the pledge manager by December 31, 2020 you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge if you contact us after December 31, 2020.

FOR OUR RETAILERS
By Pledging at the Retailer Level you hereby agree to the following terms.
• Eligibility
 > This pledge level is only valid for retailers with physical, public facing, storefronts from which they regularly and/or traditionally sell goods.
 > Strictly online retailers, “group pledges”, and buying clubs will NOT qualify for eligibility.

• Proof of Eligibility & Registration
 > The following proof of eligibility will be collected via a retailer survey upon completion of the campaign and will need to be submitted before receiving and finalizing your pledge manager:
 » Verifiable Store Name, Address, Phone Number
 » Business License/Registration
 » EIN/Tax ID Number
 > Retailers unable to register by survey deadline will not be granted access to the Retailer Pledge Manager.

• Products & Pricing
 > Retailers will only have access to the following products in the post-campaign Pledge Manager, at 50% off MSRP:
 » Gangs of the Undercity 2-Player Starter Set - $30 ($75 MSRP)
 » Gangs of the Undercity Hardback Roulebook - $25 ($50 MSRP)
 » Any Unlocked Gang Boxes - $15-$20 ($30-$40 MSRP)
 » Any Unlocked Individual Models/Kits - $5-$12.50 ($10-$25 MSRP)

• Deposit & Payment
 > Your $30 retailer pledge will be attributed to your Gangs of the Undercity pledge manager as a credit towards your complete order.
 > Orders may be finalized at any time, we will collect payment on finalized orders through backerkit once your order has been produced and is in route to your regional fulfillment center.

• Shipping
 > For your convenience, extra effort has been made to implement regional large volume/freight pricing
directly into your pledge manager.

• Breach
 > Failure to adhere to the above terms of the Gangs of the Undercity Retailer Pledge Level, including failure to provide verifiable proof of eligibility, will result in the cancellation of any orders placed and surrender of your pledge deposit.

updates.update_userinfo: Update on how things are going
updates.update_content:
Hey folks,
It has been a while since the last update, but not because we've gone anywhere. Just because there has been nothing to report. Our minis manufacturer has had to make some sculpting changes to the replacement minis in order to make them print smooth and not put extra wear on the molds, so that is taking longer than expected. I'm ready to go as soon as we get the replacement minis.

Hey folks! 
Anthology Fiction update
As always, the minute I get some more info, I pass it along!
So, as an update to the last update, the Neo Babylon Nights fiction anthology is now available in 3 formats!
To get it in print or kindle edition, head here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B094L8148W

Got some great news today, folks!
Neo Babylon Nights
Our first book of fiction (and one of the Kickstarter goals you helped us meet) is headed your way now! Long-lasting design

- Recyclable packaging 
- Padding done primarily with paper cushions. When necessary, foil/bubble wrap/air cushions are produced that are carbon neutral and able to be recycled.

campaign.story:
28mm Miniatures for the French & Indian Wars 
Over the years, we've built up a number of fantastic ranges of miniatures, many of them sculpted by the incomparable Paul Hicks. These ranges cover King Philip's War, the American War of Independence, Napoleonic Wars, and the War of 1812. It only made sense that when we wanted a French & Indian Wars range to go alongside our launch of This Very Ground: Victory or Death ruleset that we ask Paul to turn his talents to it.
The French & Indian Wars featured a lot of skirmishing and guerilla warfare and our initial offer definitely reflects that. Paul has sculpted six packs (each pack has 6 minis) that you can use to flesh out an existing collection, or to get one started. 
Our core packs, and the packs that we unlock via Stretch Goals, are shown below.
PLAY

We had a quick chat with Paul Hicks about the things he has sculpted for us, the way he gathers reference material, and his favorite minis in this range. 
 These packs, along with any others that are unlocked during the campaign, can be added to your pledge level by clicking on the "Manage your pledge" button, and then increasing your total pledge amount by the value of the packs you would like to add.


This Very Ground: Victory or Death - Wargaming rules by Keith Stine
 This Very Ground: Victory or Death was written by Keith Stine and will be published by Sinister Laboratories. We'll be including this new edition of an old favorite as a Stretch Goal during the campaign and offering it in PDF, Softback, and Limited Edition Hardback.
PLAY

Add-Ons
To take a look at images for all the available King Philip's War packs, click here:
http://brigadegames.3dcartstores.com/brigade_games_rs_king_philips_war
To take a look at images for all the available AWI packs, click here:
http://brigadegames.3dcartstores.com/brigade_games_rs_awi_american_war_of_independence
To take a look at images for all the available 1812 packs for the British and Canadians, click here:
http://brigadegames.3dcartstores.com/brigade_games_rs_war_of_1812_british_and_canadian
To take a look at images for all the available 1812 packs for the U.S., click here:
http://brigadegames.3dcartstores.com/brigade_games_rs_war_of_1812_united_states
Size Comparison
L to R: Perry, Brigade Games, Fife and Drum, BG, King's Mountain, BG, Old Glory 2nd Ed., BG, Wargames Foundry, BG, Front Rank, BG, Eureka
Shipping Costs
Your Pledge Total does not include Shipping costs. Shipping costs will be collected in the pledge manager that will follow the conclusion of the Kickstarter campaign.
Please note that the shipping costs depends on your location and the weight of the final parcel – the more packs, the higher the cost. BrigadeGames ships overseas parcels every day so we are well prepared to ship parcels anywhere. Typical charges for the USA will be $9-$16 || Canada, Mexico $15-$26  ($37 up to 3 pounds) || UK, France, Germany, Belgium, Netherlands, Italy, Ireland, Luxembourg, Japan, HK, Austria, Denmark, Spain, Portugal, Finland, Norway, Switz., Sweden, Greece*, Russia*, Croatia, Lithuania, Poland, Gibraltar, Czech Republic, Hungary, Belarus, Australia, NZ, Israel  $18-$28 ($43 up to 3 pounds.)
*Shipments to Greece and Russia will also require registered mail service which is an additional $18.
We also expect to be able to offer a "split shipment" option, where you could decide to have the first wave of miniatures shipped first (probably in July) and the second wave shipped later (we are targeting September).
About the Team
Lon Weiss is the owner of BrigadeGames.com and has been in business since 2000, importing great wargaming products and creating our own considerable ranges of miniatures. We are known world-wide as a producer of very high quality historical and fantasy miniatures. BrigadeGames is a one-man band (with occasional help from college-age and young adult children) but we pleased to work with many talented people in the industry, like Paul Hicks and Keith Stine. 
The miniatures are sculpted by Paul Hicks, who renowned as a master of his craft. Paul is BrigadeGames' primary sculptor and has sculpted a majority of Lon's ranges including: Napoleonics, War of 1812, King Philip's War, Western, Pacific War, Pirates, Musketeers, Gladiators, Atomic Cafe, etc.  
Keith Stine is former co-owner of Iron Ivan Games, and has written a lot of popular wargaming rulesets, including the original This Very Ground, and now this updated edition. 
Molding and casting is being done in the USA.
We have hosted 5 successfully funded Kickstarters - four with miniatures and one for a rulebook.

campaign.story:
News - Second set of Characters UNLOCKED!
Second set of our unique characters are unlocked! Go and check them out :). Also don't forget to add $13.7 to your pledge if you want the CLASH of Spears t-shirt!
Welcome to CLASH of Spears
Rome rises and duty calls! So pick up your shield, brother, and join the fight! Whether you are changing history by blocking Dyonisus and his gang from taking over syracuse or you are just raiding the enemy's herds trying to keep your men fed, CLASH of spears will launch you into the gritty world of skirmish battles in the ancient world! 
KS Content: CLASH of Spears Rulebook, Roman Boxed Set, Carthaginian Boxed Set and Gallic Boxed Set
See detail of pledges below, including all unlocked stretch goals to Dec 8th. Estimated retail cost per item is on red, and total estimated retail cost included per pledge in red.
*All items with an asterisk provide pledger a choice. Warband sets are choice of Roman, Carthaginian or Gaul. Same with Characters. And the bases stretch goal provides choice between bases and measuring tool.
Non-early bird pledges will be delivered in order of backing. We have expanded our initial production so good chance that all pledges will be delivered in February.
Pledge I
You will get the thanks from your friends here at CLASH of Spears! Additionally we will send you two great die rolls that will save an otherwise lost battle. Juts please remember to think kindly of us when those awesome die rolls happen!
Pledges II to VIII
In pledges II through VIII the pledger will receive 1 or 2 CLASH of spears rule book and 1 to 6 boxed sets to be chosen from any of the 3 (Carthaginian, Roman or Gaul) from the content section. That choice can be in any combination of the 3.
Pledge IX
The Consul pledge is for a select few that would like to be a creative partner of the CLASH project. It provides all of the rewards of Pledge VIII plus the complete creation of your exclusive character. 
This pledge will allow to make your hero of the ancient age a reality! CLASH authors and artists will work with you to define the aesthetics and history of this unsung hero and our sculptor will turn this character into a 28mm miniature. You will own the original sculpt and the first 10 copies of its production run.  
Retailer Pledge
CLASH of Spears is retailer friendly! Please email us at alvaroerize@fightinghedgehog.com to define your pledge. 
CLASH of Spears Rule Book
We are proud and excited to show the trial print run version of CLASH of Spears, along with one of the actual boxes the boxed sets will come in. Both of these are trial prints so final version may differ, they will be used to fix minor errors like the off center images on the box sides or small corrections in the book.
CLASH of spears is a fast paced, warband level, wargame to be played in 4’ by 4’ tables over 1 to 3 hours.It was designed to be fast and intuitive, while providing realistic feel, tactical depth and high impact decision making.
Gritty and personal, CLASH relies on command points and fatigue management to represent the chaos and desperation of small scale conflict.  Skills and traits are used to represent the different  specialties and fighting styles of the ancient world.
CLASH moves away from the massed ranks approach of traditional ancients rule sets. It has been thought of specifically for small actions, allowing units to close and open ranks as needed, and according to their preferred fighting style.
Very much a game designed by wargamers for wargamers CLASH is able to achieve tactical depth through the value of combination of arms and terrain management, rather than resorting to board game mechanics and game specific external aids.
CLASH of spears is initially set in the Rise of Rome and the Punic wars. Its 12 army  lists have been extensively playtested by 80+ people in seven countries over the last 9 months, to guarantee balanced gaming whether in club or competitive environments. 
The initial army lists are: Roman Republic, Carthaginians, Lowland Gallic Tribes (Veii), Highland Gallic Tribes (Ligurians),  Greek Colonies (Taranto/Syracuse), Iberians, Lusitanians, Celtiberians, Italian Hilltribes (Samnites), Italian Lowland Tribes (Campanians/Etruscans), Numidians, Macedonian expedition (Pyrrhus)
But with CLASH’s release we will provide full visibility into the point system and guidelines for players to quickly adapt CLASH to any period or armies of their liking through online support.
The CLASH of spears Ruleset is a hard cover 160 pages, offset printed in full color  in the finest quality.
Warband Boxed Sets
CLASH of Spears is proud to have partnered with Victrix ltd to provide ready to play warbands with a variety of troops and possible warband combinations. Our warband boxed sets combine Victrix's in skirmish level warbands of 45+ miniatures and 4 to 6 different unit types!
All miniatures come unpainted, require light assembly and do not have bases or transfers included.
Carthaginian Boxed Set
Founded in 812 BC Carthage has been a major power in the Mediterranean for centuries. Carthage’s army is a melting pot of different peoples and fighting styles. From Numidian skirmishers to Iberian guerrilla infantry, a Carthaginian leader has many different tools to surprise and outwit his opponent.  But its core of mercenary veterans ensures that a Carthaginian force can also push through by sheer strength, when necessary. So choose your forces wisely and uphold the glory of Carthage!
Roman Republic Boxed Set
In the 4th century BC the Rome has gained its independence and is now expanding to challenge both Greece and Carthage for hegemony over the Mediterranean sea.
Rome's citizen army is anchored on its strong and versatile heavy infantry. Experienced Velites lead the way with javelin harassment while Hastati and Principes provide Rome with a strong offensive force that can break through any line. Finally the Triari, armed with thrusting spear and heavily armored, provide a veteran reserve that can always be relied on. Rome also uses italian allies that specialize in guerilla tactics and can provide a nasty surprise to unsuspecting opponents. So gather up your men Roman and uphold the Republic! 
Gallic Warband Boxed Set
By the 4th century BC, the Celtic tribes that had originated in central Europe had greatly expanded having reached Spain, France and even crossed the Alps into Italy. As avid fighters Gauls formed part of most conflicts in the Mediterranean, either directly or a s eager mercenaries.
A Gallic warband relies first and foremost on the courage and ferociousness of its warriors, especially its Noble cast that is willing to lead the warband into the fray. Few can withstand the Gallic charge but a Gallic chieftain must be careful as his men can also tire quickly and become vulnerable if their impetus is spent. A strong Noble cavalry though, can be the perfect relief force to ensure that the warband gets a respite when needed. So Chieftain, lead your men forward...for Plunder and Glory! 
CLASH of Spears T-shirt
CLASH of Spears t-shirt is here! To add this reward (any Pledge II+) just add $13.70 (thirteen dollars and seveny cents) to your pledge and send me a message with your size (S, M, L, XL, XXL). 
This will not add any cost to your shipping nor will it delay your shipping in any way. We’ve worked to make it as accessible as possible and hope you will love it and wear it with pride!

CLASH of Spears is brought to you by Fighting Hedgehog, a young but driven game publishing company founded by brothers Alvaro and Francisco Erize. Although new to game publishing we are experienced gamers/designers and accomplished businessmen who will ensure this project is successfully fulfilled.
We may be a small outfit but we have poured our hearts, souls and minds into this project, to make a truly engaging and well thought out rule-set. And through the early success of the game system and the zealous support of our growing community, we have been able to expand it to a full game with excellent miniatures and more. This great adoption also ensures that CLASH will continue to be supported and expanded for years to come.
By turning to KickStarter we are giving our community an opportunity to jointly support CLASH of Spears. And by us knowing the level of that support before the production run, we can offer more value for the money, to everyone in that community. Allowing us to possibly offer original KS miniatures, free pdf version and more, at better prices.
But the creative work is already done, the book is finished and test printed. The Victrix boxed sets are designed and scheduled for. Every part is ready to be quickly produced. Which allows us to give you the very short delivery dates we are committing to, and reduces your risk as an investor.
Short Video showing CLASH game mechanics 
 Full CLASH of Spears battle report 
Exclusive CLASH of Spears author interview by Wargaming ASP delving intowhy and how CLASH of Spears was created:
CLASH author interview by Wargaming ASP 
In this weeks Weekender episode the crew at Beasts of War (OTT) talk for good 20 minutes about CLASH of Spears. Led by their elite war correspondent Gerrcinn (Jerry) McMunremur who playtested CLASH extensively at Historicon. Check it out and leave them a comment!
 OTTs review of CLASH of Spears! 
 Interview with the crew at Wargaming Recon: http://wargamingrecon.com/wr241
Dash of Elan review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vRnkm1lEf6s&t=613s 
Coming terrain line by 4Ground with original buildings for war in the Mediterranean! Not available yet but coming early in 2020...
Key Links
Blog with info and battle reports: www.thewargamespot.com/category/clashofspears/ 
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/CLASHofSpears/
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/TheWargameSpot/ 
Pre-release on the three next boxed sets (Iberian, Greek and Italian
The three next boxed sets coming are GREEK COLONIES (e.g Taranto), IBERIANS and ITALIAN TIRBES (e.g. Samnites). These armies will be produced in March and delivered in April. Also exclusively containing VICTRIX LTD miniatures of their existing line but combined in multiple troop types in one box.
Lots of people have asked us to include them as an option in the Kickstarter. So we will.
We wanted to make this KS a minimum risk one for you, where everything we have offered so far is done, fully defined, and ready for production. To be delivered shortly after the Kicstarter. These new boxed sets are still being finalized, so after thinking a lot about this we have decided to offer the option to pledge for these armies BUT with a big warning disclaimer:
WARNING: different from other things in the KS, these three armies are still in design phase. Exact contents may change (while keeping to 40+ minis) and delivery is expected for April but might be May (could also be sooner). If you are fine with these terms, and still want to pledge for an extra set/s, you will be able to do it in the survey.
Shipping: You will have to pay any additional shipping at the moment of delivery which we will arrange separate from the KS. As always we will try to minimize that cost.
So if in spite of my warnings you still want to reserve your spot at the KS discount for one of these beauties…here they are, as we know them today. Details may change but basically this will be the composition of the armies.
Iberian Boxed Set (can also be Celtiberians or Lusitanians) - 42 minis
· 6 x Iberian Scutarii
· 6 x Iberian Scutarii
· 6 x Iberian Veterans (armored)
· 6 x Iberian Veterans (armored)
· 6 x Iberian Cavalry
· 6 x Iberian Caetrati
· 6 x Balearic Slingers
Image doe not represent exact contents of the boxed set
Greek Colony Boxed Set (e.g. Taranto) - 44 minis
· 8 x Untrained Hoplites (unarmored)
· 8 x Citizen Hoplites
· 8 x Veteran Hoplites
· 6 x Cretan Archers
· 8 x Peltasts
· 6 Noble Tarantine Cavalry (light cav)
Image doe not represent exact contents of the boxed set
Italian Hill Tribes (e.g. Samnites) – 42 minis
· 6 x Italian Tribesmen (unarmored)
· 6 x Italian Tribesmen (unarmored)
· 6 x Italian Warriors (Partial Armor)
· 6 x Italian Warriors (Partial Armor)
· 6 x Italian Veterans (Full Armor)
· 6 x Italian cavalry (will be a combination of Helenic bodies and Italian heads)
· 6 x Tribal Slingers
Image doe not represent exact contents of the boxed set
How do you pledge for one of these armies?
Simple, choose a higher pledge to have the extra number of boxed sets you want. When survey comes you will be able to choose these as an option.
So here we go, for most of you our Kickstarter will still be all stuff that we have completed and ready to go. For hardcore CLASHERS that know us well, and are willing to pledge something that is still in the works, you get the chance too.
Expected Delivery: Early birds and all pledges II have a delivery date of February. Other pledges will be delivered in the order that they were submitted (if pledge survey is completed within 1 week of closing), so many of the non-early bird pledges may still be delivered in the February date.
 Attention! If you are on a budget and shipping costs are critical to you, look at the early bird pledge level II. We are subsidizing shipping so that we will have FREE SHIPPING in USA and all of EUROPE. Canada will have 4$ shipping and rest of world $8. This means we have VERY limited margin on early bird pledge II...but we really want everyone to have access to the game!
In order to keep everything organized and efficient, we allow a maximum of 1 delivery location per backer. Due to the size of the rewards and the risk of bounce back, if you wish us to ship to P.O boxes you will be charged for additional shipping if it needs to be shipped again.
Pledger will be responsible for customs, tariffs and taxes. We do ship both from the US and the UK to minimize any impact of this.
FREE SHIPPING OPTION
We at fighting hedgehog will be attending both Salute and Adepticon early in 2020 and will be happy to bring the game to YOU there if you prefer. Also we will host a day of "pick up your game" in our hometown of Atlanta in February. This will eliminate the shipping cost for you and we will refund you any costs added in the KS for shipping. Options to receive your pledge reward in person and free of shipping:
Homemeet: February 15th , Atlanta, GA, USA
Adepticon: March 25th, Schaumburg, Il, USA
Salute: April 18th , London ,UK

Risks and challenges
BID WITH CONFIDENCE!

 Unlike many other comic pitches on Kickstarter, Strange Adventures is being produced BY THE ILLUSTRATOR! I am the artist and owner of the campaign. It's a notorious hazard for comic creators to find a reliable artist, as they are often unprofessional and scatterbrained! Many pages are already complete, but there are several more left to go, as well as all the formatting and lettering. 

Since I am the owner/illustrator there is no chance of an unforeseen catastrophe occurring on account of a flighty and tempermental artist, but there is lots of work for me! Luckily, I have worked as a professional illustrator and comic artist for 20+ years, and I have produced full comics which already have been up for sale on the news stand. I am comfortable with the workload, and know the process well.

As a freelancer, I understand the importance of establishing and maintaining trust with clients, and I can say with enthusiasm and pride that I have never missed a deadline. On a current online freelancing platform, I have a "Top Rated' ranking, and maintain a confidence score above 95% always.

As far as the writing is concerned, all the scripts are complete and submitted to the Green Devil Properties offices. In terms of risks and challenges, you can be confident that should Strange Adventures be funded, the comic will be produced smoothly. 

I work as an illustrator full-time, and should this campaign be successful, I will switch my work load entirely onto finishing Strange Adventures. I hope you come along for the ride... it'll be an amazing, yet STRANGE ADVENTURE to say the least!!
 'Natch!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Triumph of Death: 28mm Renaissance skeleton army miniatures cast in white metal for gamers and collectors, by Skull & Crown Stratagem, Inc.
Every idea or mad scheme starts with a backstory...
The goal of Triumph of Death is to create a line of Renaissance-inspired, 28mm white metal undead skeletal miniatures for collectors and for use in RPGs and tabletop wargames. Based upon period art from Hans Holbein's Dance of Death ("Totentanz"), Renaissance, wood block prints from the 1500’s, we are creating skeleton Landsknechts that have that old world and Oldhammer feel. 
The boys are back in town! Painted Generals of the Apocalypse set.
Peter Breugels "Triumph of Death" is the key inspiration for this line of miniatures,
With the help of sculptor Drew Day Williams, who shared my passion to create a range of 28mm skeletons in the vein of Renaissance artists like Holbein, Dürer and Peter Breugel, we Kickstartered the original set of Triumph of Death (ToD) range of miniatures, but knew that we would not be able to do everything in one go. Death (and gamers) always demand more...
Your armies can be legion!
Thanks to backers like you, the first Triumph of Death Kickstarter was a smashing success, but we could only produce so many troop types and command figures. Many previous backers requested other troop types to round out their armies and I heard the clarion call! This is where you come in - with your help we can expand the ToD line of miniatures into a fully realized selection of infantry, cavalry and artillery models. You can command legions of the damned (damned smart looking, that is).
Painted crossbow unit with pavise
Example of 45 and 60 degree pike poses
WIP Cannon and Crew
 The Pledge Guide: Knowing your way around Death - pack options
There are 5 options for skeleton army units and 3 command packs. Each option is based on one of the following:
Infantry = 10 miniatures per pack
 Cavalry = 5 horses and riders per pack
Artillery = 1 cannon and 3 crew per pack
Command = 3 miniatures per pack
For all pledges other than the Collection of Death, you simply mix and match the units that you want.  By popular demand, I also added in the option to pick units and command from the first Triumph of Death Kickstarter (ToD - Classic), which can be used as your pack choices. 
Stretch Goals
You love them - we love them! Triumph of Death II has some sweet Stretch Goals waiting to be summoned from the depths.  All Stretch Goals are designed to be freebies for all who back a pledge that states "Eligible for Stretch Goals". 


New Unit Descriptions In-Depth 
Skeleton Infantry (for Pike or Spear)
Designed open-handed, this pack includes a mix of 60, 45 and 90 degree arc poses to create variety and allow for “ranking up” as pike or spear units would.
10 skeletons - open handed 
Styrene plastic rods for pikes or spears included!
Skeleton Infantry with Crossbows and Pavises
 1 pack of 10 skeletons firing crossbows (3 poses)
 5 pavise shields for the front rank
Skeleton Cavalry with Darts
Designed open-handed so you can also use them with spears or other hand weapons should you wish.
5 skeletons – open-handed (2 poses)
Throwing Darts
5 skeleton horses (2 poses)
Skeleton Cavalry with Bows
Light cavalry ready to harry any unsuspecting army.  Well …mostly unsuspecting, because they are fighting skeletons!
5 skeletons - firing bows (2 poses)
5 skeleton horses (2 poses)
Skeleton Artillery - Cannon and Crew
Well the cannon is not skeletal, but the crew are dead shots!
1 cannon
3 skeletal crew
 Concept Art 
Here's some of the concept art that went into the making of Triumph of Death II. In particular, the cannon and crew currently being sculpted. 
concept for pestilence
Greens
As we get some of the greens sculpted, we'll post them here. 
Unit Scale Stuff
It's always important, especially these days, to know how your miniatures measure up. When designing my ToD line, I knew that they would be going up against many of my human troops and mixed in with undead from other manufacturers, so we've made them to a scale that would fit in well with most companies. 
The Team
Triumph of Death miniatures are designed by yours truly (Thomas Foss) of Skull & Crown Stratagem, Inc. I've been designing miniatures and games for over three decades, and this project has been in my mind and heart for a long while.  Sculpting comes courtesy of the talented and a devilishly handsome Drew Day Williams (Satyr Art Studio) who has also done work for WizKids, Dwarven Forge, and Privateer Press - to name a few. Steve Phillips (Firing Line Miniatures) has been my chief caster and mold maker for almost two decades, and is taking on the title of "Master Caster" of these miniatures.  This time around I've also had the great pleasure and relief of having help in laying out the Kickstarter by the talented Kawe Weissi-Zadeh of Westfalia miniatures fame. It's like having a bespoke tailor!  All miniatures are designed, sculpted and cast In the USA.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Risks and challenges

This is my fourth Kickstarter, with a seasoned crew of sculptors and casters- so I'm pretty well acquainted with the processes and where the hiccups can happen, and am constantly working to mitigate these factors before they come up. This will be the first time I use Backerkit, so the time to get the surveys out may take a bit longer depending on the learning curve. That's why I'm giving this Kickstarter a bit more time to get rewards out. 

Most of the models of this Kickstarter, including the initial Stretch Goals, have already been sculpted, with master mold castings vetted and approved for the first set. My caster, Firing Line miniatures makes master molds from RTV instead of vulcanized rubber which greatly mitigates any chances of the master models getting wrecked in the process. 

Other than things outside of my control (like a postal strike or horrible weather) we should be good to go! Remember that Kickstarter does not unlock funds until 3 weeks after the Kickstarter succeeds, so that adds to the time I can get models out to you.

PLEASE NOTE: These miniatures are not toys and are not recommended for children under 14 years of age. These miniatures may contain lead which may be harmful if chewed or swallowed.

All miniatures are supplied unpainted, except in noted pledges.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Welcome wargamers, model makers and diorama fans! This is probably the book you’ve all been waiting for – written by the longstanding terrain makers Gerard Boom & Michael Martin. Gerard is well-known for the helpful tools he developed for the Proxxon Thermocut for many years now (see his website Shiftinglands.com). He also was the host of more than 60 XPS foam workshops throughout Europe so far – teaching newbies and pros how to build inspiring tabletop terrain. Michael is known for his weekly YouTube show ’Tabletop Workshop’ (TWS) and his excellent crafting tutorials. He’s also an experienced writer for magazines and the author of more than 15 official strategy guides for video games.
This creative dream team came together some time ago: One of their joint projects was the successful terrain workshop ’ruined city’ (see this german video report). Their favorite material is XPS foam because it’s light, very affordable and easy to handle. And with their doubled experience and enthusiasm they decided: It’s definitely time for the next level of terrain building – now in book form!
Expect techniques, tutorials and tons of tips: ’Tabletop terrain from XPS foam: Buildings’ has the power to be your new and ultimate guide for creating tabletop buildings! The 200-page DIN A4 sized book will be available in English and German language – and will include a variety of exclusive templates as free add-ons which support your own creative terrain projects. 
1. Know-how: A focussed introduction with lots of general information on XPS foam. What exactly is XPS foam? Which brands and quality levels are available and how do they differ with regard to the exact outcome? Are there any security instructions? And where can you get the best XPS foam?
2. Basics: How to cut and structure XPS foam? Which results can be obtained by etching and melting? Which kinds of glue work best with XPS foam? Are there any recommended primers? What about special painting techniques? And is sealing really required?
3. Tools: The Proxxon Thermocut is probably THE main tool for terrain builders. And: There are many optional and very helpful tools available developed by Gerard Boom during the past years. This chapter will show you how to work with the Proxxon Thermocut (or any other hot wire cutter) and how to use Gerard’s supporting tools. In addition, we’ll explain many alternative techniques in the book. So you just need the Proxxon Thermocut or similar for following the tutorials of this book, whereas the utilization of all other tools is optional.
4. Techniques: In this chapter you’ll learn how to use the exclusive templates attached to this book (please read more about the templates further on). Complex cutting techniques will be explained as well as layer techniques for building spectacular walls. On top you’ll profit from tons of tested tips and many exercises to improve your skills.
5. Tutorials: The ‚beating heart’ of this book are 15 rich tutorials with clear step-by-step instructions to create stunning buildings: fantasy, sci-fi, steampunk, historical, wild west, ancient/ruined and more. Every popular tabletop genre will be honored with at least one building. And: You’ll find tips that work fast and easy to combine and modify each building for putting a maximum of variety and individuality on your own gaming board.
For a quick and easy creation of your buildings this book will include 20 free templates to begin with. These exclusive templates are made out of stable cardboard and can be used fully modularly: Whether timber frame walls, specific roof shingles or the position of doors and windows – these templates will support all your terrain projects massively!
This campaign will start with 20 helpful free templates – and there will be many more to come by unlocking stretch goals! Please keep in mind: All templates are free supplements to the book during this kickstarter campaign only – they will be sold separately as soon as the book hits retail in mid-2020.
Template examples. Further templates will be designed and revealed after this campaign.
This campaign starts with a book of 200 pages including 20 free templates. By funding this project and unlocking several stretch goals lots of pages may be added to the book. Also the amount of templates may raise significantly. And there are other utilities in preparation for free stretch goals: useful MDF components and sunning glass sheets for windows for example (see below).
If this campaign should reach 1.000 backers we'll produce video diaries twice a month until the books are shipped. So you'll be updated with current informations, have interesting behind the scenes views and can take a look at fresh layouts. 
And if at least 1.500 backers should join this campaign YOUR NAME will be listed in our book! You can either decide if it's your full name or your kickstarter nickname (and of course you can refrain if you like). All this will be asked in the pledge manager a few weeks after this campaign. Please note: This is an offer to backers of this kickstarter campaign only!
Even if this book presents all of Gerard’s smart tools for the Proxxon Thermocut, every cutting technique will also be explained without using any of these tools. So you will get the whole crafting experience all along with just the book itself. Nevertheless Gerard’s tools give more precision, speed and comfort to your crafting process. Therefore each tutorial will include a list of recommended tools you can already find in Gerard’s Webshop Shiftinglands.com – you can directly order there or meet Gerard at conventions all over Europe or use the pledge manager a few weeks after this campaign’s end. In the pledge manager you can add any of Gerard’s tools and pay the additional amount using PayPal (same prices as on Shiftinglands.com). All tutorials with all tool lists will be posted in updates with regard to this campaign before the pledge manager will be closed. So you’ll have all the information required to make your decision.
Jeremy from Black Magic Craft is working with some of our templates.
Visit and Interview with Gerard at Black Magic Craft.
German video report about the two-day terrain workshop ’ruined city’. 
Our early Teaser
The shipping fee will be added automatically to your pledge depending on your country – see the following table below. Shipping is worldwide with DHL including tracking.
Yes, shipping is always the annoying part of any campaign. But to make it clear: The regular DHL fee for shipping from Germany to Australia for example is 47€ (US$ 52), so we took every opportunity to reduce this fee to a minimum of 31€ (US$ 34). But we know: it's still expensive – we're sorry about that but we can't change the fees.
But we can do another thing: free stretch goals! Besides more pages and more templates there are a lot of free MDF components and free colored 'glass sheets' for pimping your buildings … At the end all these free stretch goals should have a retail value of over 30€ (US$ 33).
So if you think 'shipping is to much' maybe just keep an eye on our campaign and check it out before October 13th. Then you exacly see what you'll receive for your pledge and shipping costs. And maybe ask your friends, so you can share the shipping costs.
Regarding the Brexit situation in UK: The shipping fee for UK backers may raise if the UK should leave the European Union, in which case we will send every UK backer an e-mail with our PayPal adress to ensure the payment of the additional fee. We’re sorry for any inconveniences.
Please note as well: Your pledge on Kickstarter covers your reward and shipping fee. The country-specific VAT and other taxes or import fees collected by the local authorities are not included! Perhaps you’ll have to pay these charges to the courier or custom services.

Risks and challenges
The team

Gerard Boom is a Dutch university lecturer in the Netherlands and an enthusiastic model maker for decades. In 2014 he began to develop helpful tools for the Proxxon Thermocut and to offer them on http://Shiftinglands.com and at conventions. He ran over 60 terrain building workshops in many European countries. Pictures of these workshops and Gerard’s personal terrain projects can also be found on http://Shiftinglands.com

Michael Martin is a German video games journalist and the author of more than 15 official strategy guides for video games. In 2015 he was co-founder of the YouTube channel ’Tabletop Workshop’ (TWS), since 2018 he’s running the chanel on his own. Currently there are more than 300 video tutorials, reviews and reports available. Michael is also the designer, developer and producer of the MODULAR DUNGEON, a multifaceted terrain system launched successfully via a Kickstarter campaign in 2017. Three campaigns followed presenting an increasing range of new modules – and all sets were delivered in good time as announced. Michael also runs workshops all over Germany teaching how to build richly detailed tabletop terrain and flexible multilevel dungeons.

One of Gerard’s and Michael’s joint creative projects was the two-day terrain workshop ’ruined city’ last May. Due to it’s huge success this playful event will be continued in November 2019 in Hamburg, Germany.
